title: Where's Camille??
body: Patch 6.24 is released and in the patch notes it says Camille is the new champ yet she's not ingame..  Riot hurry up with that 1850 bundle i want to give you my money.. Gonna be first lvl 7 Camille..  _**#Where'sCamille??**_

replies.body:
The [Patch 6.24 Notes](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-624-notes#patch-champions) actually state the following:

> **"Camille, the Steel Shadow, will be released later on during patch 6.24! "**

It shouldn't be too long before we see her hit the rift. ;D

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=d7UxBLKc,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-12-08T05:35:33.005+0000)
>
> The [Patch 6.24 Notes](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-624-notes#patch-champions) actually state the following:
> 
> It shouldn't be too long before we see her hit the rift. ;D

Thanks Targons Blade for the fine print lol didnt see it..  I think my hyped up self was to excited to play her all day and than was let down to even see that little detail lol..
full day after 6.24 and she still isnt available
Can you please release her today so I can play her over the weekend. I have 2 sweet days of freedom per week to play League of Legends and I want to use them to play Camille.

Riot says that in every single champion, yet they are usually released in the day the patch hits live. The only champion i remember it was the oposite was {{champion:203}}  and if u remember well she was announced to be release in a patch and ended up being released in the mid of the patch after..... so TELL US THE TRUTH

Just want to bump this for anyone who's commented, and may not have noticed. There is a "Camille Launch Day" stream announcement somewhere around here. Looks like the day to shoot for with Camille is 12/12. Sucks a bit that they're only going to get her in a day before following patch.

But the fine print just says "patch 6.24" so they are still technically meeting the goal. Best of luck folks ^^
Same i'm on EUW and shes not here Either!!!
